SELECT CONCAT(RTN.DATE, '(', #{updateType}, ')') AS COLUMN_NAME
, MAX(RTN.CATEGORY${index}) AS CATEGORY${index}_CNT
, MAX(RTN.CATEGORY${titleArray.size}) AS CATEGORY${titleArray.size}_CNT FROM (SELECT A.DATE
, IF(STAT.CATEGORY = #{item}, COUNT(1), 0) AS CATEGORY${index}
, IF(
STAT.CATEGORY = #{user}
, COUNT(1), 0) AS CATEGORY${titleArray.size} FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{startDate}, INTERVAL (@num := @num + 1)-1 MONTH), '%Y%m') AS DATE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES TAB , (select @num := 0) NUM LIMIT ${diffMonthCnt}) A LEFT JOIN (SELECT ADMIN.USER_NAME AS CATEGORY
, CONCAT(YEAR(OM.CREATED_DATE), LPAD(MONTH(OM.CREATED_DATE), 2, '0')) AS DATE
, CONCAT(YEAR(OM.MODIFIED_DATE), LPAD(MONTH(OM.MODIFIED_DATE), 2, '0')) AS DATE
FROM OSS_MASTER OM INNER JOIN T2_USERS T1 ON OM.MODIFIER = T1.USER_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT CD_DTL_NO , CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND USE_YN = 'Y') T2 ON T1.DIVISION = T2.CD_DTL_NO INNER JOIN (SELECT USR.USER_ID , USR.USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS USR INNER JOIN T2_AUTHORITIES AUTH ON USR.USER_ID = AUTH.USER_ID AND AUTH.AUTHORITY='ROLE_ADMIN') ADMIN
ON OM.CREATOR = ADMIN.USER_ID AND OM.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE DATE_FORMAT(OM.CREATED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) STAT
ON OM.MODIFIER = ADMIN.USER_ID AND OM.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE DATE_FORMAT(OM.MODIFIED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND OM.CREATOR != OM.MODIFIER) STAT
ON A.DATE = STAT.DATE GROUP BY A.DATE, STAT.CATEGORY ORDER BY A.DATE ASC ) RTN GROUP BY RTN.DATE

SELECT CONCAT(RTN.DATE, '(', #{updateType}, ')') AS COLUMN_NAME
, MAX(RTN.CATEGORY${index}) AS CATEGORY${index}_CNT
, MAX(RTN.CATEGORY${titleArray.size}) AS CATEGORY${titleArray.size}_CNT FROM (SELECT A.DATE
, IF(STAT.CATEGORY = #{item}, COUNT(1), 0) AS CATEGORY${index}
, IF(
STAT.CATEGORY = #{user}
, COUNT(1), 0) AS CATEGORY${titleArray.size} FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{startDate}, INTERVAL (@num := @num + 1)-1 MONTH), '%Y%m') AS DATE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES TAB , (select @num := 0) NUM LIMIT ${diffMonthCnt}) A LEFT JOIN (SELECT ADMIN.USER_NAME AS CATEGORY
, CONCAT(YEAR(LM.CREATED_DATE), LPAD(MONTH(LM.CREATED_DATE), 2, '0')) AS DATE
, CONCAT(YEAR(LM.MODIFIED_DATE), LPAD(MONTH(LM.MODIFIED_DATE), 2, '0')) AS DATE
FROM LICENSE_MASTER LM INNER JOIN T2_USERS T1 ON LM.MODIFIER = T1.USER_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT CD_DTL_NO , CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND USE_YN = 'Y') T2 ON T1.DIVISION = T2.CD_DTL_NO INNER JOIN (SELECT USR.USER_ID , USR.USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS USR INNER JOIN T2_AUTHORITIES AUTH ON USR.USER_ID = AUTH.USER_ID AND AUTH.AUTHORITY='ROLE_ADMIN') ADMIN
ON LM.CREATOR = ADMIN.USER_ID AND LM.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE DATE_FORMAT(LM.CREATED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) STAT
ON LM.MODIFIER = ADMIN.USER_ID AND LM.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE DATE_FORMAT(LM.MODIFIED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND LM.CREATOR != LM.MODIFIER) STAT
ON A.DATE = STAT.DATE GROUP BY A.DATE, STAT.CATEGORY ORDER BY A.DATE ASC ) RTN GROUP BY RTN.DATE

SELECT A.CD_DTL_NM AS DIVISION_NM , (SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM T2_USERS WHERE DIVISION = A.CD_DTL_NO) AS CATEGORY0_CNT , COUNT(STAT.CNT) AS CATEGORY1_CNT FROM (SELECT CD_DTL_NO , CD_DTL_NM , CD_ORDER FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND USE_YN = 'Y') A LEFT JOIN (SELECT DIVISION.CD_DTL_NM , USR.USER_ID , CASE WHEN PM.CREATOR IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE 1 END AS CNT FROM T2_USERS USR LEFT JOIN PROJECT_MASTER PM ON USR.USER_ID = PM.CREATOR AND PM.USE_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND USE_YN = 'Y') DIVISION ON USR.DIVISION = DIVISION.CD_DTL_NO AND PM.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY USR.USER_ID) STAT ON A.CD_DTL_NM = STAT.CD_DTL_NM GROUP BY A.CD_DTL_NM ORDER BY A.CD_ORDER ASC
